Title: Riverbrook
Plot: Raylan hunts an escaped prisoner who is determined to reunite with his ex-wife...and his stashed fortune.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Kristin Bauer van Straten, Chris Ellis, Damon Herriman, Johnny Sneed, Myk Watford, Bill Glass, Colleen McGrann, Walton Goggins
